channel.title: Need someone to give me some advide for hosting
channel.description: Ok, so, I want to get a dedicated host. Can someone tell me a website that is good for that? And people say you need a stable source that doesn't need an autorestart so, what is a good source for that?

item.title: Need someone to give me some advide for hosting
item.dc:creator: @whitman whitman
item.description:
@whitman wrote:

dedcated host… I use webhostingpad because its 4.96 a month and has unlimited bandwith and disk space

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to give me some advide for hosting

item.title: Need someone to give me some advide for hosting
item.dc:creator: @Twin Twin
item.description:
@Twin wrote:

Theres no such thing as a stable source really its how many times you restart your server, how good of a connection you have to the interet, and your SYIpkpker blocker. If you dont have SYIpkpker blocker i suggest you get one before its to late.

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to give me some advide for hosting
